name: dubtrack.fm - Chillout Mixer style
description:
A smoky blue style that should help put you into a relaxed mindset.

Since Dubtrack had removed it, Bebas Neue is no longer a default font option, so support for the font has been removed. (Should have mentioned it when i first made the change but eh.)
additional_info: Introduction Made for the fine people at Chillout Mixer. Get frosty! This is a continuation of my work that was previously exclusive to third-party scripts for plug.dj. Now that plug.dj is dead, I figured I would help these people claim back a similar look and feel, to make the mixer community feel at home with Dubtrack. For those who care, the story behind the style begins at plug.dj, where I wanted to do something awesome for the previous community host nite4awk / Nighthawk, who made a lot of these things called "Plugscapes", which were just different backgrounds for plug.dj people could use in their own communities and projects. I'm still giving back, even after all this time. Other code used: Better chat Better player header Chat ranks (Removed by creator request) null's suggestions, which are at the bottom of the code. PMs always on top If you are using this style, the linked content above does not need to be installed, and would more likely conflict with it. If you want this style just for Chillout Mixer, use DubX instead and enable the Community Theme function from the DubX menu. Updates 10/03/15 I wanted to have a more complete product before I updated but DubX is derping out, so i figured until that is sorted out I'll have to keep updating this. Recent additions include touchups to the avatar and playlist browser, and more exceptions for certain things. 10/04/15.1 Changes to loading stuff and additions for DubX. 10/04/15.2 Userlist had changed, fixed that. 10/06/15.1 Added global search, touchups here and there. 10/06/15.2 Added images and other stuff 10/06/15.3 Main player finally gets some love 10/06/15.4 Import tool support 10/07/15 Even though I said to myself I would not do it, i did the preview window anyway. Enjoy your changes that might last anywhere from one week to a whole month. 10/08/15.1 I got tired of the volume looking off-centre so I fixed that, as well did some other changes. This is really the last change until DubTrack's new UI is rolled out. 10/08/15.2 Added DubX stuff. I just can't stop. 10/09/15 Slight tweaks and revisions 10/11/15 Queue and room management stuff 10/12/15 More management stuff and other, little things. 10/15/15 Initial beautification complete. 10/18/15 Tidying up here or there, error boxes and stuff. 10/19/15 Soundcloud stuff. 10/27/15 Font stuff. 11/01/15 Player stuff. 11/05/15 Second-generation UI 11/06/15 third-party import / export refresh 11/07/15 DubX refresh 11/09/15 Little odds and ends, as well tweaks specified by the room host. 11/13/15.1 Subsequent updates appear to have removed additions in previous updates. These additions are hopefully added back in, and the entire right-side has been modified for improved transparent colour and specific-user colour use. 11/13/15.2 Added first-party import dialog. 11/16/15 Added DubX-exclusive changes to undo what Sinful had done for DubX users to centre stuff. Since this is for this theme only, other themes will remain unaffected. 11/24/15 Modified so the bottom section uses the same code from my new better chat style, to showcase its usefulness. 11/25/15.1 Skip button position is fixed, the return of the stripes in places where stripes.png is used is pending. 11/25/15.2 Stripes are back! 12/04/15.1 Little annoyances fixed, as well, inclusion of other work noted on top. 12/04/15.2 Border in avatar_tools now matches everything else, player-controller .left lost the background colour and instead uses a gradient to make it look more like a progress bar, as well litle optimizations here and there. 12/05/15 A slight DubX refresh. 12/07/15 Some neatening up. 12/11/15 Adding new changes from my better chat style, as well other changes that are more visible to the end-user. 12/12/15 Moved VIP and Resident DJ into the same colour block as Mod / Manager, and made Co-owner / Creator less bright in colour. 12/17/15 Dubtrack added more stuff, so I changed that. Also, DubX's ETA tooltip is now changed. 12/23/15 DubX icon finally matches everything else because I learned how to use a little bit of the filter property. Also, Dubtrack's improved the add to playlist button, which introduced new classes now reflected in this style. 12/23/15 Added a fix for private messages in mini mode. 12/25/15 Merry Christmas! Modified vote buttons to always be dark blue on hover and added more song grab stuff. 12/27/15 Alpha colours have been added to header and footer. 01/02/16 Happy new year! This update changes how SoundCloud music is handled graphically. 01/27/16 Seems Dubtrack is using a new font. Since one change here is to fix a fonts issue somewhere in Dubtrack, I have to change that here as well. 02/02/16 Modified and added new stuff for the extra button under the video player. 04/27/16 Sorry for the long wait for a couple little changes, I had nt been feeling terribly motivated a of late due to some issues I've been having with Dubtrack. Nonetheless, I'm committing this change to do the following; * Centre join text * Remove the queue join banner when not in queue 05/27/15 After one month, another update has been released to include changes for the donation button and extra DubX stuff. 06/17/16 Some late changes for the code, mainly to play with user colours. Also made the add to playlist menu opaque. 07/31/16 Did some overdue changes for the main player, player preview and playlists 08/18/16 Applied fix for better chat 09/25/16 Recoloured new elements and cleaned up some other things 09/28/16 Hot on the heeels of my last update, I fixed the chat options background, modified default autocomplete and modified the chat colours for the buttons at the input container. 09/30/16 Another update for the user management stuff and some cleanup in different parts of the UI. 11/24/16 Applied fixes for the playlist and chat as necessary. 12/12/15.1 Added more things for DubX and spruced up the place counters in #browser, as well fixing other things. 12/13/16.2 Added more things for DubX that I missed out all this time. Whoops. 12/14/16 Added chat leave notifications 01/04/17 Added dialog box updates 02/26/17.1 Added stuff for Dub+ menu, since that's the new thing Chillout Mixer uses. Check it out at its website 02/26/17.2 Added dialog buttons, because those were never tampered with. Also, centered menu icons on the left side to line up with the switches.
